title: 637: BITCOIN RALLY INCOMING!!!! SUPPLY SHOCK IN PLAY THIS WEEK!!!! MIKE TYSON FUELS BTC VS. ETH DEBATE!!
description:
A popular on-chain analyst believes that a Bitcoin rally is in the cards as BTC faces the possibility of a supply squeeze. Will Clemente says that a Bitcoin supply shock could ignite a significant BTC rise.

“Hang in there guys. This thing is going to pop soon.

Supply shock still in play this week.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
